verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I draw near to you
I have strayed from your ways
Do not leave me in my shame
My Lord and my God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my Lord God
My King and my Master

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Teach me your paths
Give me your direction
Put to death my selfishness
My Lord and my God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My hope is in you
My rebellion is with you
Your great mercy is on me
My Lord and my God
